about_the_game:
Hey heyyy! Step right up and indulge in the whimsical world of Hangry Bear! Stroll down streets bustling with delectable chaos, execute gravity-defying flips, and give your inner bear a chance to shine in a tumultuous pursuit of gastronomic glory. In Hangry Bear, time is a fishy currency, and only the most ravenous of bears will reign supreme.

Features:

🐾 Four Levels of Mayhem: Immerse yourself in the bedlam of four delightfully distinct levels, each more 'bear-tastic' than the last. It's a hangry escapade like no other!

🎯 The Pursuit of Fishiness: Follow the conspicuous red arrow as you chase your next tasty objective – a mouthwatering fish! Can you appease your bearish appetite and become the ultimate culinary critter?

🕹️ Controller Elegance: Play as you please with complete controller support. Get set to bare it all with your preferred controls!

🎤 Bear-illiant Tutorial: Master the art of bear acrobatics and tactical dropkicks at your own pace with our dulcet-toned tutorial. You'll be bear-ing it all like a pro in no time.

🏆 Competitive Bear-ism: Amass points by enduring the longest, amassing the most fish, delivering acrobatic front flips, and administering face-pummeling dropkicks. The leaderboard beckons – can you stake your claim?

🎮 Classic Arcade Frolic: Hangry Bear offers brisk, pick-up-and-play sessions that'll keep you returning for more. Perfect for when you require a breather from epic gaming extravaganzas.

Are you primed to flip, dash, and dropkick your way to bear brilliance? Hangry Bear is your passport to a side-splitting adventure filled with bearish antics and satirical sustenance. Get ready to embrace your inner bear and let the hangry hilarity unfurl!

name: Hangry Bear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel SomethingOrOther
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Bear your hunger and prepare for a paw-some time! Hangry Bear's arcade adventure lets you dash, flip, and dropkick your way through a hilarious frenzy. Can you keep your cool while your bear belly rumbles, racing against the clock to satisfy your fishy desires and secure bear-brilliant high scores?
